content:
I'm now getting a message like this when I run my builds:

Error connecting to build server - running without build (c:\temp\qa.json (The system cannot find the path specified))
java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\temp\qa.json (The system cannot find the path specified)
        at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.open0(Native Method)
        at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.open(FileOutputStream.java:298)
        at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:237)
        at java.base/java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:187)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.TextFile.bytesToFile(TextFile.java:188)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.npm.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadFromBuildServer(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:656)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.npm.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.checkBuildLoaded(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:643)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.npm.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.checkCurrency(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:624)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.npm.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadPackage(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:487)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.templates.TemplateManager.loadPackage(TemplateManager.java:251)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.templates.TemplateManager.installTemplate(TemplateManager.java:93)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.templates.TemplateManager.loadTemplate(TemplateManager.java:79)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initializeFromIg(Publisher.java:1715)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initialize(Publisher.java:1530)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:749)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8777)```

In fact, I get multiples - one for each template the publisher tries to load.  I have no idea why it's trying to load anything from c:\temp - as that's not a folder that exists.  Thoughts @**Grahame Grieve**?
sigh. that's a whoopsie on my part - a bit of debugging code I forgot to remove, and then I couldn't get a new core out. Done now, so I can fix it. Should be about 30min away

Load Template from hl7.fhir.template#current (00:27.0881)
Error connecting to build server - running without build (class com.google.gson.JsonNull cannot be cast to class com.google.gson.JsonArray (com.google.gson.JsonNull and com.google.gson.JsonArray are in unnamed module of loader 'app'))
java.lang.ClassCastException: class com.google.gson.JsonNull cannot be cast to class com.google.gson.JsonArray (com.google.gson.JsonNull and com.google.gson.JsonArray are in unnamed module of loader 'app')

I don't know. does it keep happening?
David Pyke has marked this topic as resolved.
